author: jnftfi
content: Just in time for EIP-1559 launch: we just added a little web front-end to the open-source cadCAD/radCAD model Ethereum Economic Model shared here earlier. It's quite fun, hope some here will find it useful. We are always super grateful for feedback and suggestions (contact@cadlabs.org).
